entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Fog at times this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
